article_title: Should IRS File Your Return For You?

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Would you trust IRS to prepare your tax return? Some countries across the world already have a system that allows taxpayers to simply approve government prepared returns. Would that work in the US?
og.title: Fix The Tax Code Friday: Should IRS File Your Return For You?
